definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: More volume equates to being able to handle faster line speeds and larger areas.
sentences.chinese: 更多体积相当于能够处理线速度更快和更大的领域。

sentences.english: Effects of the specific pressure on nucleation rate and linear growth velocity were expounded in squeeze casting.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了挤压铸造比压对形核率及成长线速度的影响。

sentences.english: Automatic compensation of linear velocity can guarantee that die-cutting size for each batch of cartons is in full accord.
sentences.chinese: 线速度自动补偿确保每批纸箱的模切尺寸完全一致。

sentences.english: The wheel maximum linear velocity should in accordance with the machine specification requirement.
sentences.chinese: 砂轮最高工作线速度要符合机床规格要求。

sentences.english: Line speeds and conveyor heights are determined in the design stage of your system.
sentences.chinese: 线速度和运输高度根据您的系统设计平台决定。

sentences.english: A row of line uses the microcomputer independent control, tracks the link speed by the pharo electricity encoder.
sentences.chinese: 排线采用微机单独控制，由光电编码器跟踪线速度。

sentences.english: The obtained optimized formula of wire-feeding velocity can guide practice production.
sentences.chinese: 得到的最佳喂线速度公式可用于指导实际生产。

definition: angle of drift (navigation)/deflection (from course)/angle of divergence
simple harmonic motion (in mechanics)/motion of a simple pendulum
arc length (the length of a curve segment)
